intro:
“Funimal” is a turn-based sliding puzzle
 that you move the ground to lead Funimal and
 < you can always clear in 5 moves or fewer! >
description:
The purpose is to move various objects at different fields
 to lead (=CATCH) the unknown creature “Funimal” to the goal.

■How to is simple! Just move it ↑ or ←!
Simply select the ground you want to move and slide it vertically or horizontally?it's that easy!
There's no time limit, so you can take your time without feeling rushed.


■The story proceeds as your CATCH
Pokke and Pikke are here to support you.
The more you CATCH Funimal, the more new information and new places you'll discover.
Whenever there's a new discovery, it seems they'll let you know.

Please enjoy CATCHING together with them.


■No worries if puzzles aren't your thing!
Most stages can be cleared in just 3 moves,
making it easy to think things through repeatedly and plan ahead.
It's enjoyable regardless of gaming experience or age!

Even so, stuck and can't figure it out...?
If that happens, try Redoing it a few times, and Pikke will give you a “Hint”!

...That said, the further you progress, the harder it gets.
Puzzle pros will definitely enjoy it too!


■Encyclo of Living things
You can check detailed info on the Funimals you've CATCHED in the encyclopedia.

Successfully CATCHING them seems to unlock more details to explore.
Why don’t you browse the encyclopedia relaxing between CATCHES?
It's fun!
